titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 100th Anniversary of military aviation in Indiana.
A resolution celebrating the 100th Anniversary of military aviation in Indiana.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates August 1, 2021, as the 100th anniversary of military aviation in Indiana and recognizes the continued service of the Indiana Air National Guard, the Aviation Brigade of the Indiana Army National Guard, and the 434th Air Refueling Wing of the U.S. Air Force Reserve Command.
